document.full_text: chad's foreign minister on saturday rejected allegations by libyan rebels fighting the government of leader muammar gaddafi that chadian officers were fighting alongside gaddafi's soldiers.
document.title: chad denies officers fighting gaddafi troops
lines_and_colors: chad's foreign minister on saturday rejected allegations by libyan rebels fighting the government of leader muammar gaddafi that chadian officers were fighting alongside gaddafi's soldiers.
